value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

value.excerpt: Distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks are rampant and it's not a question of if a business will be impacted but when. value.title: Improve security with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. Azure Sentinel delivers intelligent security analytics and threat intelligence across the enterprise,

value.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Master securing your Azure workloads with Azure Security Center. In this module, you’ll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

value.title: Monitor and report on security events in Azure AD
value.excerpt: Keep tabs on security events in your Azure AD resources by using built-in reporting and monitoring capabilities. Respond to events as they happen, and address security risks before they become a problem.

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.title: Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kelly Anderson joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Security Center, which offers built-in security management and threat protection for your cloud workloads. Azure Security Center helps you find & fix vulnerabilities, aids in blocking malicious access and alerts you when your resources are under attack.

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Protect public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to design conceptual architecture for data classifications using data residency for Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 services while utilizing Azure regions and Customer lockbox. Manage breach notifications in Service Trust Portal and Azure Security Center. And encrypt data throughout its lifecycle.

topItems.title: Design cloud solutions for the public sector
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the stakes and options for implementing Azure to safeguard public sector data.

topItems.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.
